name: Shoot The Balls
description:
New game from '100 Balls' creators.

'Shoot The Balls' is simple but addicting app. Test your reaction in single tap game with realistic physics engine.

Tap on screen to target the cannon and fire the bullet ball. Your goal is to shoot as many flying shapes as you can. Shapes with the balls will refill the cannon with new bullets. Heart shapes will add more lives. The longer you survive in the game, the more points you get. Empty cannon or lost all lives will end the game.

• Physics engine;
• Single tap control;
• Short game (~5 min.);
• Leaderboard;
• Achievements;
• Sounds and music.
